title: *//2227 Elandon Dr//** 2 Bedroom Apartment Downtown Cleveland, OH
posting_body: I said I was going to repost the apartment when we were ready to show it with more pictures.
We have a lot of people that want to take a look at it.
We are sorry we do not allow pets of any kind.
Also there is no smoking on the property.
It is $800 a month with hot water, water/sewer included only.
Apartment has a brand new heating system with central air conditioning.
We are going to start showing it tomorrow morning July 20th.
Plenty of parking and the apartment is on the 2nd floor.
Still need to put a new kitchen floor in.
We will be taking applications and we will also do a background check.
If you are interested please send me your number.
